sentences.en: An independent adviser has been brought in to conciliate between the two sides involved in the conflict.
sentences.cn: 一位独立顾问被请来调停卷入冲突的两方.
对工会进行调停的努力

sentences.en: He wanted to explain and conciliate her.
He would never stoop to conciliate.
His duty was to conciliate the people, not to provoke them.
sentences.cn: 他的职责是安抚那些人，而不是去激怒他们。

sentences.en: I should do well to conciliate this ancient Mammon of Unrighteousness.
sentences.cn: 我得尽量谦卑一些,好博得这位老谋深算的恶神的好感.

sentences.en: It is hard to conciliate their views.
Lily is my only love, whose coolness and elegance conciliate my soul.
sentences.cn: 我独爱着百合, 她的淡雅她的清凉慰藉我心灵.

sentences.en: They are both trying hard to conciliate one another.
sentences.cn: 双方都在拼命想取得谅解.

sentences.en: They tried to conciliate natives with presents.
sentences.cn: 他们用礼物来博得土著人的好感.

sentences.en: We conciliate a large customs'faith with high quality and service in these years.
sentences.cn: 多年来,以质量为先导,以服务求生存,博得了广大客户的信赖.

trans.tran_cn: 安慰, 赢得, 调和
trans.tran_en: to do something to make people more likely to stop arguing, especially by giving them something they want
